page.title: 04TRADE
page.content: The majority of{food shopping}is done in Sandbach.The main supermarkets are Kwik-save,Victor Value and the Co-op. However,some shopping is done in places like Crewe,Talke,Northwich and Winsford.Mainly,shopping is done once a week,but some people shop once a month.Occasionally shopping is done once a fortnight.The following{items} are usually bought on a regular basis: Bread,butter,margerine,jam or marmalade,cereals,eggs,tea,sugar, coffee,fresh vegetables,frozen vegetables,tinned vegetables,flour, pasta,cooking fat or oil,washing-up liquid,washing powder,soap,fresh fruit ,tinned fruit,fresh meat,frozen meat, tinned meat,frozen fish,tinned fish, toilet rolls,biscuits,cake,crisps, fruit juice,cheese,yoghurt,lemonade or other fizzy drink and toothpaste.
